job_title: PostgreSQL Developer with expertise in AWS

job_details.degree_required: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.

jd: From: Charan, Anveta charan@anveta.com Reply to: charan@anveta.com Role: PostgreSQL Developer with expertise in AWSLocation: Fort Mills, SC & Sandigo, CA Duration: 12+ Months Job Description:* We are seeking a highly skilled Database Developer with expertise in AWS, Postgres, and serverless-managed instances to join our dynamic team.* The ideal candidate will have experience in designing and developing applications, optimizing database performance, and working with DDLs, DMLs, and performance tuning.* Familiarity with Python and Liquibase is a plus. Key Responsibilities:* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to design and develop scalable applications with a focus on database performance and data integrity.* Leverage AWS cloud services, with a focus on serverless managed instances to ensure high availability, scalability, and optimal performance.* Develop, maintain, and optimize PostgreSQL databases, ensuring data accuracy, security, and performance.* Experience working with CREW or similar platforms to integrate and manage workflows.* Create, manage, and optimize Data Definition Language (DDL) and Data Manipulation Language (DML) statements for efficient database schema and data management.* Conduct in-depth analysis and performance tuning of databases to ensure optimal query performance, reduce response times, and improve resource utilization.* Provide technical expertise in database architecture, design, and development, ensuring best practices for database optimization and data integrity. Optional to have:* Experience with Python for scripting and automation related to database management and development.* Familiarity with Liquibase for database version control, schema management, and migration processes.Qualifications:* Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.* 10+ years of experience in database development with a focus on Postgres and AWS.* Strong understanding of Serverless architectures and cloud-native database management.* Proven experience in designing and developing applications, managing schemas, DDLs, DMLs, and performance optimization.* Experience in CREW or related platforms for workflow integration is highly desirable.* Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills with attention to detail Thanks & RegardsCharanAnveta, Inc.1333 Corporate Drive, Suite #108Irving, TX 75038charan@anveta.comhttps://www.linkedin.com/in/charan-reddy-ba6450236/
